speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but I don’t appreciate these calls. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with your credit account.

speaker: Customer
text: Look, I've requested multiple times to be placed on your do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Let me take care of that for you right now.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I just don’t want to be disturbed anymore.

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand, and I will ensure your number is added to the do not call list.

speaker: Customer
text: Great. Please make sure it’s done.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, it will be processed immediately. Thank you for your understanding.
